name: Stupid Glue Game(Oculus Only)
description:
This is a stupid  and random game about sticking things together to make a more powerful weapon,

but you can only lift so much weight

This game have some weird grabbing, shooting and moving systems(intentional)

and I hope you have a fun time playing this stupid game

Credits:

Hammer and sledgehammer model, sounds, gun sounds from Boneworks

Code refrence from WeldHands: An amazing mod for Boneworks by Garry Newman(Kota)

Enemy model from Mixamo

(Only for Windows  Oculus)
